actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide that employees of the House Beauty Shop shall be subject to the compensation classification system established by the House Employees Position Classification Act.

summary.text: Includes employees of the House Beauty Shop within the compensation classification system established by the House Employees Position Classification Act. Designates such individuals as Congressional employees.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that employees of the House Beauty Shop shall be subject to the compensation classification system established by the House Employees Position Classification Act.
